name: Hamburger Mode
description:
A new interactive experience is here! This 'game' will leave you speechless, as you pick your way through up to fifteen different endings, give or take the ones that I completely missed.

Now YOU can experience the fun and excitement of flipping a switch labelled Hamburger Mode on and off! In this 'game' you play as a random bucko whose computer has suddenly and mysteriously gained a switch labelled "Hamburger Mode" that, perhaps unsurprisingly, uncovers mysterious transformative powers. What misadventures will come out of this?

Probably lots. Who knows?
